data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Mordovia who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mordovia, Russia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Mordovia, Russia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 104 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Mordovia, Russia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, help the 12,710 believers in Mordovia to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 855,790 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Mordovia, Russia.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Tabasaran people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Mordovia.
Spirit, help the 12,710 believers in Mordovia to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Father, encourage the 12,710 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
